feedback: Candidate demonstrates excellent Python development skills and familiarity with service integration.
Experience with deploying applications in cloud environments (e.g., AWS) is evident but specialized Azure and GCP understanding is not explicitly mentioned.
Familiarity with toolsets like PyTorch and Transformers aligns well with requirements for LLM fine-tuning.
Experience duration is slightly below the job description's requirements but shows competence in relevant roles.
Overall, the resume provides a good alignment with the job description; more explicit certifications and formal experience alignment are areas for improvement.
